translations: 最令人觉得怪异的；害怕的（spooky 的最高级）

sentences.sentence: Carved pumpkins abound this Halloween season, but a decorated gourd dated to 1793 may be the spookiest of them all.
sentences.translation: 在这个万圣节的季节里，雕刻的南瓜随处可见，但是一个可以追溯到1793年的装饰南瓜可能是所有南瓜中最神秘莫测的。

sentences.sentence: Walking through a graveyard at night is the spookiest thing I can think of.
sentences.translation: 夜晚穿过墓地是我所能想到的最阴森可怕的事情。

sentences.sentence: Its Halloween... time to dress up in your spookiest best and grab all the fun!
sentences.translation: 万圣节…穿上你的时间的最好抓住所有的乐趣！
